definition: to quarrel/to make a noise/noisy/to disturb by making a noise
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: The goose heard the racket and she, too, started hollering.
sentences.chinese: 那隻母鵝也聽到吵鬧聲，便對韋伯大喊起來。

sentences.english: Some students heard the noise and gathered around us.
sentences.chinese: 有些學生聽到吵鬧聲圍過來看。

sentences.english: I object to all this noise.
sentences.chinese: 我對所有這些吵鬧聲很反感。

sentences.english: He was confused by the noise.
sentences.chinese: 你要是關上那扇門，就聽不到吵鬧聲了。

sentences.english: The constant jangling noise got on my nerves.
sentences.chinese: 持續不斷的吵鬧聲令我受不了。

sentences.english: A loud noise diverted my attention from studying.
sentences.chinese: 吵鬧聲分散了我學習的注意力。

sentences.english: The noise redoubled, and sleep was out of the question.
sentences.chinese: 吵鬧聲更大了，睡覺是不可能的了。

sentences.english: I am started at the loud noise.
sentences.chinese: 我被那響亮的吵鬧聲驚起。

sentences.english: The manager was annoyed by the noise of his employees.
sentences.chinese: 經理被他的僱員們的吵鬧聲弄得很煩躁。

sentences.english: A hubbub was heard in the courtyard .
How can you permit such much noise in your house?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼能允許你的房子裏有這樣吵鬧聲？

sentences.english: We have grown used to this noise.
sentences.chinese: 我們對這種吵鬧聲已習已爲常了。

sentences.english: She was quite frightened by the sudden noise outside the door.
sentences.chinese: 她被門外突然的吵鬧聲嚇住了。

sentences.english: If you close that door you can shut the noise in.
sentences.chinese: 你要是關上那扇門，就聽不到吵鬧聲了。

sentences.english: She turned up the radio to drown out the noise from next door.
sentences.chinese: 她開大了收音機的音量，以壓過隔壁房間的吵鬧聲。

sentences.english: The noise of the next door won't make me sleep.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的吵鬧聲使我無法入睡。

definition: to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
to whisper to one another's ear
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
